thread.section_title: Cruisesalefinder Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Cruisesalefinder | cruisesalefinder.com.au
thread.title: Peter Ropata

author: Peter Ropata
title: Peter Ropata
text:
I reserved a 10 day Cruise in October online, the next day I decided to use our future cruise booking and the initial consultant I had was not up to speed on the $100.00 future cruise deposit. I was put through to Amy who sorted it out professionally and provided us with an additional $50.00 onboard credit.
Thank you Amy for your help and professionalism.
